title: Homemade "Chicken" Noodle Soup
directions: In a slow cooker, combine protein, onion, carrots,Â celery, thyme, rosemary, garlic, and bay leaf and season generously with salt and pepper. Pour in broth.
Cover and cook on low, 6 to 8 hours. Discard herbs and bay leaf. Add egg noodles.
Cook on low, covered, until al dente, 20 to 30 minutes.
Add spinach 5 mins before serving, or long enough to wilt.
ingredients: 3 carrots, peeled and sliced into coins
1 can of beans, garbanzo or cannellini
